name: Waxwing 2.0
tagline: A marketplace for Human assisted AI agents
description: Upwork 2.0 for human-assisted AI agents: Get AI-generated previews of each service, DIY or hire AI-savvy experts, or run 500+ expert-built workflows. AI does the heavy lifting, humans ensure the outcome. Let's make AI great again!

name: Supaboard AI
tagline: Business Intelligence provided by AI data analysts
description: Supaboard is a next-gen BI tool that helps you build powerful dashboards from your data securely without any expertise. Unify data from multiple sources with almost no setup and get precise answers from industry-trained AI analysts even with minimal prompts.

name: Claude for Education
tagline: AI for higher ed, with a new learning mode for students
description: Claude for Education revolutionizes learning with AI to guide critical thinking. Partnering with top universities, we're introducing Learning Mode, campus-wide access, and student programs that empower educators and learners to shape AI's future in academia.

name: AutonomyAI
tagline: Meet your Next Dev Hire
description: AutonomyAI introduces context-aware agents that handle front-end development tasks and deliver fully production-ready code. Free your team from repetitive dev work, allowing them to concentrate on creating exceptional products. Join for early access!

name: Langflow Desktop
tagline: Build AI-powered Agents -- in Minutes
description: Langflow is a dev tool for building and deploying AI-powered agents. It includes a visual authoring experience and built-in API server that turns every agent into an API. Supports all major LLMs, vector databases and a growing library of AI tools.

name: Viva Labs
tagline: Winning AI Video Ads
description: AI video ads that actually convert. Our suite of agents researches winning messages, generates professional UGC/B-Roll content, and analyzes ad performance‚Äîin just a few minutes.

name: TwinMind: AI Second Brain for Mobile
tagline: Remember meetings, lectures, or your entire life for free
description: Never take notes again. Get free unlimited transcription of everything you hear and say‚Äîeven offline inside your pocket all day‚Äîwith full privacy. Get proactive answers before you even ask. Chat with all your memories and the web. No gadgets‚Äîjust get the app!

name: GitSummarize
tagline: Create beautiful internal documentation from any GitHub repo
description: Turn any GitHub repository into an interactive AI-powered documentation hub. GitSummarize eliminates stale and outdated documentation, and always keeps it up-to-date. PRO TIP: Replace 'hub' with 'summarize' in any GitHub URL ‚Äî instantly.

name: Vantedge AI
tagline: The AI agent marketplace for investors
description: Vantedge AI is the one-stop AI infrastructure and Agent Marketplace for funds and fintech startups. We simplify AI adoption for investors and provide distribution for curated AI agents.

name: Motionvid.ai
tagline: Create motion graphics within seconds with AI
description: Motion design just got radically easier. With Motionvid.ai, describe your idea in plain words and watch it transform into a full animation with cinematic visuals and fluid motion. Great for YouTube videos, shortform content, blogs posts or launch videos.

name: Neuron AI
tagline: Your AI, On Your Device - Private & Secure
description: Neuron AI is designed for 100% privacy, speed, and full control ‚Äî it runs completely on-device, meaning no internet is required and no data ever leaves your device. Don‚Äôt believe it? Turn on airplane mode and be amazed.

name: oMoo
tagline: Listen to music through your hand via haptic feedback
description: oMoo is an AI-driven haptic music player that can let everyone touch the pulse, texture, and rhythm of music on their phones. We want to bring the power and beauty of music to everyone, including people who are deaf or hard of hearing.

name: Playwrk: Virtual Private Club for Gamers
tagline: Where Gaming Meets Networking
description: Virtual private club for gamers and a custom Discord app where entrepreneurs, executives, and senior professionals from tech, finance, business, creative, eSports, and beyond play together in a friendly environment while making new global connections.

name: PERSO.ai - AI Dubbing With Lip Sync
tagline: AI Translation, Dubbing, & Lip-Sync Has Never Been Easier
description: Easily localize your videos in 29+ languages with smooth, accurate lip sync. PERSO.ai delivers high-quality results at a fraction of the cost, making it easier than ever to expand your content to global audiences.

name: Rauversion
tagline: Rauversion/rauversion: open source music multiverses
description: Rauversion is an open-source music streaming platform that empowers artists and communities to create their own music ecosystems. Our mission is to provide ways for music communities to promote and monetize their work, reducing dependence on music monopolies

name: Sim Studio
tagline: Drag-and-drop AI agent builder
description: Sim Studio is a drag-and-drop platform for building agent workflows. Our user-friendly interface allows any user or developer to create complex agent workflows instantly. Integrate with Slack, GMail, Pinecone, Mistral, and much more.

name: MedMatch Pro
tagline: Identify pills & find global meds in seconds
description: MedMatch Pro: Identify pills & find global meds fast! üåçüíä Snap a photo to ID pills, search med equivalents worldwide, save lists. Perfect for travelers & med management. iOS only (Android soon!). Try it now! üöÄ

name: Meta Explorer
tagline: The easiest and fastest way to find SEO Meta
description: Meta Explorer is a FREE chrome extension that allows you to check SEO meta tags of any site you browse without any clicks.

name: MagicWP
tagline: Powerful tools for WordPress wizards
description: Free WordPress Tools and Code Generators for Developers. Enhance your WordPress development workflow with MagicWP Tools

name: Prompt Template Generator
tagline: Share AI prompts that anyone can customize
description: Turn your AI prompts into customizable templates that anyone can use. Simply mark the fields users should fill in, share a link, and they'll get an easy to use form which creates a perfectly formatted prompt every time.
